TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed BookmarkResumptionResult extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Defines an enumeration whose members represent the outcome of bookmark scheduling requests.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.BookmarkResumptionResult NotFound = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The bookmark resumption was not scheduled because the bookmark could not be found.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.BookmarkResumptionResult NotReady = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The bookmark resumption was not scheduled because the runtime has not yet created the bookmark. The host should wait until another idle point to try resumption again.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.BookmarkResumptionResult Success = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The bookmark resumption was successfully scheduled.
